story:
BRIEF

Alí Fallas Solano is an 8 year old kid who is ready to play with Kostroma's Orchestra, in Moscow Russia. He will be the youngest pianist to play a whole concert with the Orchestra and also the youngest one to play Honegger's Concertino for Piano. He has achieved this thanks to his teachers at Costa Rica's Instituto Superior de Artes (insupart.com), Alexandr Sklioutovski, Tamara Sklioutovskaia, Gerardo Meza, Ludmila Melzer, Valentina Tumanova and Jonatan Albuja.

Alí practices piano at least three ours a day besides his regular piano lessons and school obligations. And he has fulfill wonderfully. That is why we are asking for your support, because he has gave the best, and now he is on his way to Russia, but depends upon your support that he finally gets there.

He has this opportunity because he was selected by the American Fine Arts Festival (AFAF) to participate in the Russia Tour. You can go to the webpage of the organization and check this year winners on this link: http://afafestival.com/piano-strings-winds-voic...

For 10 day Alí will share in Kostroma with other young musicians but also he will also have workshops with piano teachers and players of world class level, in the next link you can check the tour program - Alí will only take the Russia tour-: 

http://afafestival.com/summer-in-europe/summer-...

Breve reseña

Alí Fallas Solano a sus ocho años está listo para tocar junto a la Orquesta de Kostroma, en Moscú, Rusia. Será así el intérprete más joven en tocar un concierto con ellos y también en ejecutar el Concertino para Piano de Honegger. Llega acá gracias a la tutela de sus profesores en el Instituto Superior de Artes de Costa Rica (insupart.com), Alexandr Sklioutovski, Tamara Sklioutovskaia, Gerardo Meza, Ludmila Melzer, Valentina Tumanova y Jonatan Albuja.

Alí practica al menos tres horas diariamente, además de asistir a clases de piano y a su escuela. Y ha cumplido con creces. Por eso estamos solicitando su apoyo, porque él ha dado lo mejor de si, está en camino a Rusia, pero depende de ustedes ahora que llegue. 

Esta oportunidad se le presenta porque fue seleccionado por el American Fine Arts Festival (AFAF) para participar de su Tour en Rusia. Puede acceder a la página de esta organización y ver a los ganadores de este concierto en el siguiente link: http://afafestival.com/piano-strings-winds-voic...

En Kostroma Alí compartirá durante 10 días con otros jóvenes músicos pero además tendrá talleres con profesores y ejecutantes del primer nivel, en el siguiente link puede ver el programa del viaje - Alí solo participa del Tour en Rusia - : http://afafestival.com/summer-in-europe/summer-...


What we need and what you get

After his teacher and family have gave all our support, now comes a stage that can only be achieved with the help of all of you, to finance his travel expenses. It is a 10 days activity in Russia, and we must pay Alí travel, his mom and part of his teacher expenses as well, since the teacher is going to be the link between the Costa Ricans piano players and the russian orchestra.

* Plane tickets Costa Rica-Russia

*Internal transportation Moscow-Kostroma

*Transportation within Kostroma city

*AFAF's Russian Tour

*Living expenses for the 10 days of the activity (food and accommodation)

*Partial cost of teacher travel

*To thanks your help, those who donate $50 or more will get an original painting, post card size, those who donate more than $150 a painting of 25X32cms, and for those who help with more than $300 another original painting of 35X45cms. All this painting are the work of Cindy Solano, Alí's mom. Also when Alí returns to Costa Rica he will give two free recital to all those who helped him.

*Any donations made directly to the Instituto Superior de Artes are deductible from taxes in Costa Rica

*If the goal is not reached, the money collected will be use to finance other Alí's presentations on international stages

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Luego de que profesores y familia le hemos dado todo el apoyo, ahora viene una etapa que solo con la ayuda de todos ustedes podemos lograr, cubrir los costos del viaje. Se trata de una actividad de 10 días en Rusia, para lo cual se debe cubrir el viaje de Alí, de su mamá y parte de los viáticos de una profesora que será el puente entre los intérpretes costarricenses y la orquesta rusa.

  • Tiquetes aéreos Costa Rica-Rusia
  • Transporte interno Moscú-Kostroma
  • Transporte dentro de la ciudad
  • Tour en Rusia de la AFAF
  • Viáticos de alimentación para los 10 días de la actividad
  • Costo parcial del viaje de la profesora guía
  • Para agradecer su contribución, a quienes aporten $50 o más, una obra pictórica original de tamaño tarjeta postal, quienes aporten $150 o más una obra de 25X32cms y para quien apoye a este pianista con $300 o más una obra de 35X45cms. Todas esas pinturas son obra de Cindy Solano, madre de Alí. Igualmente al regreso Alí dará dos conciertos, aquí en Costa Rica, a los que podrán asistir gratuitamente todos los que nos hayan apoyado. 
  • Las donaciones que se hagan directamente al Instituto Superior de Artes son deducibles del impuesto sobre la renta
  • De no alcanzarse el monto total, los fondos se utilizarán posteriormente para cubrir la participación de Alí en otros concursos internacionales

Impact

Alí Fallas Solano is a kid dedicated to his piano, he plays it because he loves it. To him, as a musician, to be a soloist with an orchestra such as Kostroma's is an incomparable experience and will enhance his formation. To reach the exact measure of rhythm, the intentionality of the play is to reach to the deapest places of the sensibility that characterizes as all as creative transcendent beens. With the guidance of this teachers and the support of his family, he had been able to touch those fibers of his inner person, he managed to talk through music and with it to create, even as his short age, a work of art with his interpretation.

This will be Alí's third international concert. As family we covered the expenses of the first two in the Carnegie Hall. The first time he was invited by The Botazzi International Muscial Society and School of Music, the second one he won the second place in the American Protégé International Music Talent Competition (Fall 2014) - http://www.americanprotege.com/TalentFall2014.htm -

With music kids, as Alí, Costa Rica shows that it can nurture many young talents. Gifted young's that with their daily effort make their nation shine in international stages. Realize this trip is to show that dreams can be achieved, that in Costa Rica there is Art with capital letters and that is has a place to be.

El impacto

Alí Fallas Solano es un niño que se dedica al piano, lo hace porque lo ama. Para él, como músico, ser solista de una orquesta como la de Kostroma es una experiencia inigualable, por el acto en sí y por lo que implica para su formación. Alcanzar la medida justa del ritmo, de la intención de su interpretación es ir a lo más hondo de aquella sensibilidad que nos caracteriza como seres creativos y trascendentes. Con la guía de sus profesores y el apoyo de su familia, él logró tocar esas fibras de su ser, logró hablar con la música y con ella crear, aún con su corta edad, una obra de arte en la interpretación.

Esta será la tercera presentación internacional de Alí, como familia nos encargamos de cubrir las primeras dos en el Carnegie Hall. La primera vez fue una invitación de The Botazzi International Musical Society and School of Music, la segunda fue por haber ganado el segundo lugar del American Protégé International Music Talent Competition (Fall 2014) - http://www.americanprotege.com/TalentFall2014.htm -

En niños músicos como Alí, se demuestra que en Costa Rica germinan muchos talentos. Jóvenes muy capaces que con su esfuerzo diario llevan a esta nación a destacar en los grandes escenarios del mundo. Concretar este viaje es demostrar que los sueños si se pueden lograr, que en Costa Rica hay ARTE con mayúsculas y que tiene su espacio para ser. 


Risks and challenges

The biggest goal is already achieved, Alí won his place at the AFAF and his right to play with Kostroma's Orchestra. What is yet to overcome is to finance the expenses of the trip.

Alí's dedication has been constant, he practices daily to improve little details, refining his interpretation, following his teachers guidance and growing as a pianist.

Here the limitation is monetary. The challenge is not for a kid to identify with a french play of the beginnings of the 20th Century and to interpret it according to the needs of a professional musicians orchestra. Between this young piano player and Russia the challenge is the cost of the trip. What Alí is missing is to afford the expenses of his plane tickets and the 10 days stay along with other musicians as him. Alí has a 10 days opportunity to show the best of his country: honest hard work, dedication, order, discipline as well as that sparkle, the roguery that makes out of a player an artist.

The only way to overcome this challenge is in you. We can all help!

Riesgos y desafíos

La gran meta que es la selección de Alí como intérprete por parte de la AFAF y la Orquesta Kostroma, ya se cumplió. Lo que queda pendiente es cubrir los costos del viaje.

La dedicación de Alí ha sido constante, practicar diariamente mejorando detalles, afinando su interpretación, siguiendo las indicaciones de los profesores y creciendo como pianista. 

Aquí la limitante es monetaria. El desafío no es lograr que un niño se sensibilice con una obra francesa de inicios del siglo XX y le de una interpretación acorde con las necesidades de una orquesta de músicos profesionales. Entre este niño pianista y Rusia el desafío es el costo del viaje. Lo único que le falta a Alí ahora es poder pagar su tiquete y sus diez días en compañía de otros músicos como él. Diez días en que Alí tiene la oportunidad para representar lo mejor de nuestro país: el trabajo honesto, la dedicación, el orden, la disciplina y esa chispa, esa picardía que hace de un ejecutante un artista.

La única forma de vencer este desafío está en ustedes. ¡Aportemos tod@s!


Other ways to help

If you like you can make your donation directly to the Banco Nacional (Costa Rica) account number: 200-01-153-001379-7 or SINPE number: 15115320010013792. Also you can make your donation directly to the Instituto Superior de Artes (insupart.com) which are deductible from taxes in Costa Rica.

But the best of all is that everybody can help, if not with money, yo can share this with your friends, contacts and anybody that you know. If you share you will already have helped Alí. Everything counts and pushes Alí closer to Russia.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si usted gusta puede hacer depósitos directamente a la cuenta del Banco Nacional (Costa Rica), número: 200-01-153-001379-7, o número SINPE: 15115320010013792. También puede hacer su donación directamente al Instituto Superior de Artes (insupart.com) las cuales son deducibles del impuesto sobre la renta.

Pero lo más cierto es que aquí tod@s podemos ayudar, si no con dinero, vale más que usted se lo pueda pasar a sus amigos, contactos, conocidos. Con solo que comparta esta solicitud ya habrá apoyado a Alí. Todo suma y pone a Alí más cerca de Rusia.
story_txt:
BRIEF
Alí Fallas Solano is an 8 year old kid who is ready to play with Kostroma's Orchestra, in Moscow Russia. He will be the youngest pianist to play a whole concert with the Orchestra and also the youngest one to play Honegger's Concertino for Piano. He has achieved this thanks to his teachers at Costa Rica's Instituto Superior de Artes (insupart.com), Alexandr Sklioutovski, Tamara Sklioutovskaia, Gerardo Meza, Ludmila Melzer, Valentina Tumanova and Jonatan Albuja.
Alí practices piano at least three ours a day besides his regular piano lessons and school obligations. And he has fulfill wonderfully. That is why we are asking for your support, because he has gave the best, and now he is on his way to Russia, but depends upon your support that he finally gets there.
He has this opportunity because he was selected by the American Fine Arts Festival (AFAF) to participate in the Russia Tour. You can go to the webpage of the organization and check this year winners on this link: http://afafestival.com/piano-strings-winds-voic...
For 10 day Alí will share in Kostroma with other young musicians but also he will also have workshops with piano teachers and players of world class level, in the next link you can check the tour program - Alí will only take the Russia tour-: 
http://afafestival.com/summer-in-europe/summer-...
Breve reseña Alí Fallas Solano a sus ocho años está listo para tocar junto a la Orquesta de Kostroma, en Moscú, Rusia. Será así el intérprete más joven en tocar un concierto con ellos y también en ejecutar el Concertino para Piano de Honegger. Llega acá gracias a la tutela de sus profesores en el Instituto Superior de Artes de Costa Rica (insupart.com), Alexandr Sklioutovski, Tamara Sklioutovskaia, Gerardo Meza, Ludmila Melzer, Valentina Tumanova y Jonatan Albuja.
Alí practica al menos tres horas diariamente, además de asistir a clases de piano y a su escuela. Y ha cumplido con creces. Por eso estamos solicitando su apoyo, porque él ha dado lo mejor de si, está en camino a Rusia, pero depende de ustedes ahora que llegue. 
Esta oportunidad se le presenta porque fue seleccionado por el American Fine Arts Festival (AFAF) para participar de su Tour en Rusia. Puede acceder a la página de esta organización y ver a los ganadores de este concierto en el siguiente link: http://afafestival.com/piano-strings-winds-voic...
En Kostroma Alí compartirá durante 10 días con otros jóvenes músicos pero además tendrá talleres con profesores y ejecutantes del primer nivel, en el siguiente link puede ver el programa del viaje - Alí solo participa del Tour en Rusia - : http://afafestival.com/summer-in-europe/summer-...   

What we need and what you get
After his teacher and family have gave all our support, now comes a stage that can only be achieved with the help of all of you, to finance his travel expenses. It is a 10 days activity in Russia, and we must pay Alí travel, his mom and part of his teacher expenses as well, since the teacher is going to be the link between the Costa Ricans piano players and the russian orchestra.
* Plane tickets Costa Rica-Russia
*Internal transportation Moscow-Kostroma
*Transportation within Kostroma city
*AFAF's Russian Tour
*Living expenses for the 10 days of the activity (food and accommodation)
*Partial cost of teacher travel
*To thanks your help, those who donate $50 or more will get an original painting, post card size, those who donate more than $150 a painting of 25X32cms, and for those who help with more than $300 another original painting of 35X45cms. All this painting are the work of Cindy Solano, Alí's mom. Also when Alí returns to Costa Rica he will give two free recital to all those who helped him.
*Any donations made directly to the Instituto Superior de Artes are deductible from taxes in Costa Rica
*If the goal is not reached, the money collected will be use to finance other Alí's presentations on international stages


Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes Luego de que profesores y familia le hemos dado todo el apoyo, ahora viene una etapa que solo con la ayuda de todos ustedes podemos lograr, cubrir los costos del viaje. Se trata de una actividad de 10 días en Rusia, para lo cual se debe cubrir el viaje de Alí, de su mamá y parte de los viáticos de una profesora que será el puente entre los intérpretes costarricenses y la orquesta rusa.  Tiquetes aéreos Costa Rica-Rusia
Transporte interno Moscú-Kostroma
Transporte dentro de la ciudad
Tour en Rusia de la AFAF
Viáticos de alimentación para los 10 días de la actividad
Costo parcial del viaje de la profesora guía
Para agradecer su contribución, a quienes aporten $50 o más, una obra pictórica original de tamaño tarjeta postal, quienes aporten $150 o más una obra de 25X32cms y para quien apoye a este pianista con $300 o más una obra de 35X45cms. Todas esas pinturas son obra de Cindy Solano, madre de Alí. Igualmente al regreso Alí dará dos conciertos, aquí en Costa Rica, a los que podrán asistir gratuitamente todos los que nos hayan apoyado.  Las donaciones que se hagan directamente al Instituto Superior de Artes son deducibles del impuesto sobre la renta De no alcanzarse el monto total, los fondos se utilizarán posteriormente para cubrir la participación de Alí en otros concursos internacionales


Impact

Alí Fallas Solano is a kid dedicated to his piano, he plays it because he loves it. To him, as a musician, to be a soloist with an orchestra such as Kostroma's is an incomparable experience and will enhance his formation. To reach the exact measure of rhythm, the intentionality of the play is to reach to the deapest places of the sensibility that characterizes as all as creative transcendent beens. With the guidance of this teachers and the support of his family, he had been able to touch those fibers of his inner person, he managed to talk through music and with it to create, even as his short age, a work of art with his interpretation.
This will be Alí's third international concert. As family we covered the expenses of the first two in the Carnegie Hall. The first time he was invited by The Botazzi International Muscial Society and School of Music, the second one he won the second place in the American Protégé International Music Talent Competition (Fall 2014) - http://www.americanprotege.com/TalentFall2014.htm -
With music kids, as Alí, Costa Rica shows that it can nurture many young talents. Gifted young's that with their daily effort make their nation shine in international stages. Realize this trip is to show that dreams can be achieved, that in Costa Rica there is Art with capital letters and that is has a place to be.


El impacto
 Alí Fallas Solano es un niño que se dedica al piano, lo hace porque lo ama. Para él, como músico, ser solista de una orquesta como la de Kostroma es una experiencia inigualable, por el acto en sí y por lo que implica para su formación. Alcanzar la medida justa del ritmo, de la intención de su interpretación es ir a lo más hondo de aquella sensibilidad que nos caracteriza como seres creativos y trascendentes. Con la guía de sus profesores y el apoyo de su familia, él logró tocar esas fibras de su ser, logró hablar con la música y con ella crear, aún con su corta edad, una obra de arte en la interpretación.
Esta será la tercera presentación internacional de Alí, como familia nos encargamos de cubrir las primeras dos en el Carnegie Hall. La primera vez fue una invitación de The Botazzi International Musical Society and School of Music, la segunda fue por haber ganado el segundo lugar del American Protégé International Music Talent Competition (Fall 2014) - http://www.americanprotege.com/TalentFall2014.htm -
En niños músicos como Alí, se demuestra que en Costa Rica germinan muchos talentos. Jóvenes muy capaces que con su esfuerzo diario llevan a esta nación a destacar en los grandes escenarios del mundo. Concretar este viaje es demostrar que los sueños si se pueden lograr, que en Costa Rica hay ARTE con mayúsculas y que tiene su espacio para ser. 
    


Risks and challenges
The biggest goal is already achieved, Alí won his place at the AFAF and his right to play with Kostroma's Orchestra. What is yet to overcome is to finance the expenses of the trip.Alí's dedication has been constant, he practices daily to improve little details, refining his interpretation, following his teachers guidance and growing as a pianist.
Here the limitation is monetary. The challenge is not for a kid to identify with a french play of the beginnings of the 20th Century and to interpret it according to the needs of a professional musicians orchestra. Between this young piano player and Russia the challenge is the cost of the trip. What Alí is missing is to afford the expenses of his plane tickets and the 10 days stay along with other musicians as him. Alí has a 10 days opportunity to show the best of his country: honest hard work, dedication, order, discipline as well as that sparkle, the roguery that makes out of a player an artist.
The only way to overcome this challenge is in you. We can all help!

Riesgos y desafíos  La gran meta que es la selección de Alí como intérprete por parte de la AFAF y la Orquesta Kostroma, ya se cumplió. Lo que queda pendiente es cubrir los costos del viaje.
La dedicación de Alí ha sido constante, practicar diariamente mejorando detalles, afinando su interpretación, siguiendo las indicaciones de los profesores y creciendo como pianista. 
Aquí la limitante es monetaria. El desafío no es lograr que un niño se sensibilice con una obra francesa de inicios del siglo XX y le de una interpretación acorde con las necesidades de una orquesta de músicos profesionales. Entre este niño pianista y Rusia el desafío es el costo del viaje. Lo único que le falta a Alí ahora es poder pagar su tiquete y sus diez días en compañía de otros músicos como él. Diez días en que Alí tiene la oportunidad para representar lo mejor de nuestro país: el trabajo honesto, la dedicación, el orden, la disciplina y esa chispa, esa picardía que hace de un ejecutante un artista.
La única forma de vencer este desafío está en ustedes. ¡Aportemos tod@s!   
Other ways to help
If you like you can make your donation directly to the Banco Nacional (Costa Rica) account number: 200-01-153-001379-7 or SINPE number: 15115320010013792. Also you can make your donation directly to the Instituto Superior de Artes (insupart.com) which are deductible from taxes in Costa Rica.
But the best of all is that everybody can help, if not with money, yo can share this with your friends, contacts and anybody that you know. If you share you will already have helped Alí. Everything counts and pushes Alí closer to Russia.
Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar  Si usted gusta puede hacer depósitos directamente a la cuenta del Banco Nacional (Costa Rica), número: 200-01-153-001379-7, o número SINPE: 15115320010013792. También puede hacer su donación directamente al Instituto Superior de Artes (insupart.com) las cuales son deducibles del impuesto sobre la renta.
Pero lo más cierto es que aquí tod@s podemos ayudar, si no con dinero, vale más que usted se lo pueda pasar a sus amigos, contactos, conocidos. Con solo que comparta esta solicitud ya habrá apoyado a Alí. Todo suma y pone a Alí más cerca de Rusia.

story:
What's the big idea?


Guiding Principals:

More Trees Records is a no profit Distro/Label that combines ethics of Anti-capitalism, biocentrism, collective liberation,direct action, and solidarity to foster positive music scene(s). Many of us live in a scene that we don't identify with- or are completely against, thats why it is necessary to create the spaces we want to be in. Or take spaces when needed.

For close to 3 years now I've been organizing various things under the name "More Trees Records" but with this IndieGoGo- your support I promise you we can break into the stratosphere. It has been my life long dream to create a self sufficient "no profit*" collectively run distro. 

"*No Profit" - any money gained from albums, artwork, etc will be given to those artists/individuals. 

Usually "management" would ask for percentage for doing business at the expense of "talent."- More Trees Records is proud to provide services from pressing, publishing, promoting, booking, and more for all free! 

Capitalism motivates lawyers and business people(s)  to view art and artists as just another resource to make it big without even playing a note. 

More Trees always has always put art and the creative talent of individual(s) as the driving motivation to keep going-.

But now it's time to take to the airwaves. With the power of the interwebz, More Trees Records plans to produce content twice monthly between 45-90 minutes long.


Why a Radio Show though?

For as long as I can remember I've loved radio one of the main goals of this project is to have a mouth piece for many other kinds of creative people(s) that a distro alone cannot accomplish. It will be host to a array of folks from artists, community organizers, bands, etc.

This show would be in addition to/to complement the artists, and friends of More Trees Records.

The show will consist of Stories & Report backs from the front lines, music, guests, and reviews.


But What about the Music?

Fret not! the music is certainly not taking a back seat- in fact we're now working on our 2nd pressing of the Hudson Valley Earth First Comp!


but wait there's a BIG announcement- NEW MUSIC FROM BATTING A THOUSAND!!!!!!

the hope is to have new music from Batting A Thousand by the end of 2015 and what could kick off 2016 in a big way better than a serious release?

-----------------------------------

What is needed-Whats the money gonna get?


1,500$ would be an amazing amount of money that would make a lot of really awesome things come to life! If the goal is reached shows could start as early as this fall!

buying CD's and other raw media like shippers, cases, etc gets really expensive really fast. But buying in bulk proves to pay off in the long run.
A domain to host content, with some additional space due to the streaming aspect, at least one more decent microphone, a mixer, and talent.

I was looking at some modestly priced "Home Recording Studio Kits" which run about 200$ or so. These bundles come with a lot of the things that will be necessary to record audio

Raw media, CD's, Tapes, Cases, and other such items.

The breakdown (below) details what it would cost to produce a run of pressings that is separate form all currently scheduled releases.

At the end of this year Batting A Thousand will be putting out NEW music, the money raised here would be for a banging first pressing! all copies would be numbered and denote that they were "Powered by IndieGoGo"


Exact costs-

Studio bundle kit (for recording artists/the podcast) 230$- this includes a mixer, 1 condenser microphone and pop filter.

Secure server space 200$/yr - 300$/yr (high bandwith needed for streaming etc ) Utilizing a D.I.Y. internet co-op to host content on a website that isn't bandcamp would be ideal to sell directly to people without being tied to a 3rd party.

1 extra headset microphone for guests 100$

Extra software for editing- 60$

CD's+Cases- 120$

Initial stipend/Gas money fund for guests - 250$


Fulfillment-

Money for shipping- (fulfillment) 100-200$ (depending on how many people get physical merch) 

Fulfillment for Indiegogo supporters 250$


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So why should the proletariat fund this?

That something thats up to you, if the goal is reached a great deal of content and creativity can erupt!

Regardless of how well this campaign does or doesn't do More Trees Records will continue to actively support talented individuals and attempt to make connections between radical politics within the music scene.

None of the money- and I mean none of the money will go into someones pocket for personal use 100% of funds raised goes directly into operation (pressing CD's, printing zines, equipment for More Trees Records Radio, server space, etc)


What has More Trees been up to?

We've released content from folks like "Little Moss" who's hit songs "Road Block" & "LOCK" are still bumping in the shale fields- and beyond!




To Releasing the full Discography of Batting A Thousand



And more recently a 2 disc benefit CD for a local Earth First! collective!


If any of this was enticing to you and you chose to donate I'm truly blown away, if you get it but don't/can't throw in thats cool too- but sharing this page goes a long way!


Solidarity forever,
Crabgrass
More Trees Record's 1st Propagandist.

For all pitches, booking, and press inquires please contact More Trees Directly Moretreesrecords@gmail.com

story:
WHO AM I? 

I am Edson Hutton aka Supaturbolocity an all around creative individual aligned with music on the path & quest of ancient  knowledge & wisdom. My vast interest in ancient history ,tribal culture & time travel has paved the way for a new birth in music called "TRIBAL TRAP MUSIC"(a mix of reggae,hiphop rhymes & chants with high energy rebelutionary concepts)   connecting the past , present & future empowering the minds of the masses wealthy Kings & Queens to the everyday Rebel warrior also targeting the minority ghetto youths from the projects of America,the trenches of Jamaica  to the infested slums in Africa .

This kind of music could shape the future & spark the youngest minds to change their oppressed reality from helpless to Unstoppable "GOD UP!!!!" , innocent kids daily are being attacked by a corrupted legal system in North America & the planet ,I was also one of those kids.

THE TRUTH

I recall getting arrested in the middle of Time Square Manhattan as a young teenager for selling CD"s , the cops stated an outrageous & ridiculous lie stating that I robbed a woman purse & ran off with it ,i had nobody to my defense & was helplessly charged for something i did not do while in the back of the cop car i heard the cop driving said to the cop in the passenger seat "We gotta get 10 more for the day". It all hit me that i was just a lucky catch in the pawn of a corrupted cycle that could have even been executed & framed without a question if they wanted.Years later & its the same cycle we need a great divine intervention!

MY MISSION

My independent produced album is now complete I'm looking for people who see my vision & would like to shift the harsh reality of the systematical & mental slavery of the Original melinated man through the vibrations of conscious music .My new single Gods & The  Dieties bleeds through the hearts & the minds of the original man you know who you are Dark Matter.A part of a monumental moment in modern history is about to take place but a big piece of the puzzle needs your help  , this song is in need of a professional video that will educate , change & inspire please here my roll call for a cause that may save your future grandchild & mankind overall,please support & fund this epic video for my REBELUTIONARY song Gods & Deities.

WHAT IS A GOD & A DEITY?

Gods,Goddesses,and mythology defined a diety or a God as ''a being with powers greater than those of ordinary humans,but who interacts with humans,positively or negatively,in ways that carry humans to new levels of consciousness beyond the grounded preoccupations of ordinary life''.
E.Hutton
@SUPATURBOLOCITY

4242608463

story:
The Passion for the Project

Hello, my name is Andy Taylor, a singer song writer, from Ontario, Canada.

 I am in need of your help to complete a new CD project we have been working on entitled "Nothing Short of a Miracle".

I have been told that my songs have a passionate, soulful flavour to them.

In 1999 I found myself on Vancouver Island, addicted and hopeless. At times I was eating in soup kitchens and frequenting food banks.

I was not far off from being out on the streets, as I couldn't function in society any longer in the condition I was in.

God in His miraculous way, pulled me out of that grey mess I was in and saved me! He has given me purpose, a new life and family. He has given me a voice and a platform through performing music and giving testimony to His faithfulness. I want to continue to give back in service and song. Singing for the people who find themselves hopeless, addicted, in need of healing. Singing to people who simply need to be inspired, ministered to and lifted up. I sing in parks, churches, halls, institutions and I continue to record songs for radio airplay. 

The truth is, I will sing anywhere I am lead to.

I have always known that music has a powerful influence on people.

Certainly it has had a profound effect on my life in so many ways. Music can motivate and energize. It soothes the soul and can play a prominent part in healing and connection to God, others and our inner self.

In 2008 I released an album entitled “In the Stillness”.

Songs from that album were nominated in the 2008 GMA-Covenant Awards.

Canadian radio stations currently play tracks from that album.

I will need your help however to continue. We have recorded 3 of the 7 songs for the new album and now will need more funds to complete the project.

“Nothing Short of a Miracle” is a special collection of songs that reflect my heart for God and the title speaks to His greatness, in that, He would save even "a wretch like me”.

What We Need & What You Get

Well, putting an album together has various, significant costs.

We will need a bare minimum of $7,500 to complete this project. However,  I have more songs written to record if the provision are there.

More funds, more songs!

Break down

A majority of the funds are taken up with the costs for hired professional, passionate musicians, to play along side me and an award winning producer Andy   Horrocks, all taking place at "AME Studios" in Kitchener, ON.

Studio time, production and mastering costs are also significant.

We need to pay for physical copies of the CD and photography for the CD. Promotional costs; there will be a small CD release party tour consisting of 2 or 3 dates at strategically chosen venues and I will need funds to pay musicians for the main concerts.

I will also need to fulfill the perk commitments. The crowdfunding video needs to be paid for and my website desperately needs restructuring so people can easily communicate with me and access music and products.

So please, prayerfully consider getting involved in this project and help spread the love of God through music by ministering to others through songs.

I truly believe that God wants me to get these new songs out for people to hear, for the purpose of drawing people closer to Him with messages of hope, inspiration and truth.

Perks

Please check out all the perk packages. It's my way of giving back and saying thank you with what I have to give with out compromising the main goal. Also, I have been creative and personal so you may know that we are doing this journey together.

Thank you!!!!

The Impact

As time has passed, I have had people, through email, through my website and in person, share with me that particular songs from the "In the Stillness" album have brought them comfort through hard times and that the songs have been a blessing to them and have ministered to them.

That is the type of conformation that is precious and why I continue to do this!

You can help me connect and minister to others with your financial involvement.

Risks

There are no real risks for the project, except that if the goal is not met then there will simply be less songs on the EP. We are already three songs deep. I am trusting God with this project and humbly accepting help from you to go forward.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you find that you can not contribute financially, that doesn't mean you can't help and be involved if you want to. Together let's get the word out and make some noise about the "Nothing Short of a Miracle" CD campaign. Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools! 

Please tell your friends, church groups, community partners and use your social media talents to get people excited.

Please pray for this ministry!

Thank you so much for taking the time to get involved and to consider going on this journey with me and helping to fund this project!

Thank you!

Andy
story_txt:
The Passion for the
Project
Hello, my name is Andy
Taylor, a singer song writer, from Ontario, Canada.
 I am in need of your help to complete a new CD project we have been working on entitled "Nothing Short of a Miracle".
I have been told that my songs have a passionate, soulful flavour to them.
In 1999 I found myself on Vancouver Island, addicted and hopeless. At times I was eating in soup kitchens and frequenting food banks.
I was not far off from being out on the streets, as I
couldn't function in society any longer in the condition I was in.
God in His miraculous way, pulled me out of that grey mess I was in and saved me! He has given me purpose, a new life and family. He has given me a voice and a platform through performing music and giving testimony to His faithfulness. I want to continue to give back in
service and song. Singing for the people who find themselves hopeless, addicted, in need of
healing. Singing to people who simply need to be inspired, ministered to and lifted up. I sing in parks, churches, halls, institutions and I continue to record songs for radio airplay. 


The truth is, I will sing anywhere I am lead to.
I have always known that music has a powerful
influence on people.
Certainly it has had a profound effect on my life in so many
ways. Music can motivate and energize. It soothes
the soul and can play a prominent part in healing and connection to God, others and our inner self.
In 2008 I released an album entitled “In the Stillness”. 
Songs from that album were nominated in the 2008 GMA-Covenant Awards.
Canadian radio stations currently play tracks from
that album.

I will need your help however to continue. We have recorded 3 of the 7 songs
for the new album and now will need more funds to complete the project.
“Nothing Short of a Miracle” is a special collection of songs
that reflect my heart for God and the title speaks to His greatness, in that, He would save even "a wretch like me”.
What We Need & What You Get
 Well, putting an album together has various, significant costs.
We will need a bare minimum of $7,500 to complete this project. However,  I have more songs written to record if the provision are there.
More funds, more songs!
Break down
A majority of the funds are taken up with the costs for hired professional, passionate musicians, to play along side me and an award winning producer Andy   Horrocks, all taking place at "AME Studios" in Kitchener, ON.
Studio time, production and mastering costs are also significant.
We need to pay for physical copies of the CD and photography for the CD. Promotional costs; there will be a small CD release party tour consisting of 2 or 3 dates at strategically chosen venues and I will need funds to pay musicians for the main concerts.
I will also need to fulfill the perk commitments. The crowdfunding video needs to be paid for and my website desperately needs restructuring so people can easily communicate with me and access music and products.
So please, prayerfully consider getting involved in this project and help spread the love of God through music by ministering to others through songs.
I truly believe that God wants me to get these new songs out for people to hear, for the purpose of drawing people closer to Him with messages of hope, inspiration and truth.
Perks
Please check out all the perk packages. It's my way of giving back and saying thank you with what I have to give with out compromising the main goal. Also, I have been creative and personal so you may know that we are doing this journey together.
Thank you!!!!

As time has passed, I have had people, through email, through my website and in
person, share with me that particular songs from the "In the Stillness" album have brought them
comfort through hard times and that the songs have been a blessing to them and have ministered to them.
That is the type of conformation that is precious and why I continue to do this!
You can help me connect and minister to others with your financial involvement.

Risks
There are no real risks for the project, except that if the goal is not met then there will simply be less songs on the EP. We are already three songs deep. I am trusting God with this project and humbly accepting help from you to go forward.

story:
What We Are

Air Mix Virginia has been given the opportunity through the Virginia Radio Co-op to start the first 24-hour, clean Hip-Hop and R&B radio station in Central Virginia. In order to see this dream through to a reality, we need your help.

Since the invention of Hip-Hop in the late 70's, we have seen the art form take on various sounds and personalities.  It is our mission to provide a radio station that represents the entirety of Hip-Hop and R&B music and various related sub-genres.  In addition, we are looking forward to providing a large community involvement aspect  to help educate and inspire our communities.

Unlike large corporate run stations, 101.3 JAMZ  is a non-profit station that will not operate as simply a computer playlist.  JAMZ will employ the use of some the best live mix DJ's and on-air personalities.  We strongly believe that it's the people that make a successful radio station.  Our DJ's will be dedicated to bringing you the best mixes and the most current, cutting-edge music.  Our on-air personalities are respectful, articulate, and responsible members of our community, that together form a multi-cultural melting pot that can reach out to many different backgrounds. Additionally, we want the feedback of the community to help us be the best station possible. 


What We Need & What You Get

Air Mix Virginia and The Virginia Radio Co-op have already done a great deal of the dirty work.  A location for the station has been chosen, and the facilities have been remodeled to accommodate our needs.  We are almost there, but in order to bring you the highest quality experience we need a few more things.  That is where you come in!  Your money will be used to purchase the equipment inside our studio to insure your listening experience is top notch!

Here is a short list of equipment needs:

1.  main studio computer + soundcard for automation (our main computer that all the music will be playing from)

2.  main studio mixing console (the control board and faders that serves as the "brain" of all mics, computers, and CD players)

3.  secondary computer (all phone calls, drops, liners ,and various edits are done on this computer)

4.  main audio processor (all audio is routed through this to meet broadcast standards before being transmitted on the air)

5.  transmitter (transmits our signal on the air)

7.  misc (tower rent, building rent, Co-op expenses to date)

In the event we do not reach our fundraising goal your money will still go towards the eventual launch of 101.3 JAMZ.  We will purchase whatever we can with the money raised from this campaign and look for other fundraising opportunities to reach our goal if it is not met here. 

Help us become Charlottesville's #1 Station for Hip-Hop and R&B!


Our Impact

Our staff has over 75 years of combined radio experience, and our DJ's have been rocking clubs and parties for over 20 years.  A captivating on-air presence combined with an online streaming will give our listeners a unique experience.  We will be the first station in this region to represent the entire diaspora of Hip-Hop music, past, present, and future. 

If you have been alive in the last forty years than you have had some sort of experience with Hip-Hop music.  Help us keep that experience alive and growing.  There is a dearth of outlets representing the art form in it's entirety, and it is our goal to help preserve the classic Hip-Hop sound as well as set the standard for a new generation of listeners. 

Additionally, 101.3JAMZ will actively support community non-profits and organizations by informing the public about local events,healthcare and charities.  We will work with the city to educate the urban community on programs and activities that will help our community grow and succeed.  

101.3 JAMZ is already forging partnerships with regional music venues in an effort to help facilitate the booking of more national Hip-Hop acts in the area. Local artist will also have opportunities with JAMZ.  We welcome local artists to submit their music for play on the station, as long as it meet's our broadcast guidelines.  We support Hip-Hop LOCALLY and GLOBALLY!

Lastly, 101.3 JAMZ is a CLEAN lyric radio station.  We want you, the listener/supporter, to feel comfortable tuning in any time and anywhere. And, for our supporters out of the listening area, we will be streaming live online via our website as well as rolling out dedicated smartphone apps later down the road.


Risks & Challenges

The ball is rolling!  We already have a wonderful space that has been remodeled to accommodate our station.  However the longer we are off-air, the harder it will be for us.  Every month we are not broadcasting we are losing money.  It is important that we reach our goals soon so we can begin supporting the community, and in turn the community can begin supporting us.  

Every donation (small or larger) helps us.  Every contribution gets us closer and closer to our goal of providing you 24-hours-a-day of clean, quality programming. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in the position to give financially there are other ways to help! Please share this event with your friends via email or social networking.  Help us drum up support for 101.3 JAMZ.  If 1,000 people give $20 dollars we have reached our goal.  So please tell anyone and everyone you can about our campaign.  Word of mouth helps us more than you know.  There are options on this page to help you with spreading the word.  Use them!

Thank you so much for supporting 101.3 JAMZ!

Please share this event with your friends via email or social networking.  Help us drum up support for 101.3 JAMZ.  If 1,000 people give $20 dollars we have reached our goal.  So please tell anyone and everyone you can about our campaign.  Word of mouth helps us more than you know.  There are options on this page to help you with spreading the word.  Use them!Thank you so much for supporting 101.3 JAMZ!

story:
Who we are?

Holy Name of Jesus School (K-8) is located in inner city Los Angeles at the flash point of the 1992 riots. 85% of our school families live below the poverty line based upon the Federal School Lunch Program standards.

For 90 years Holy Name of Jesus School has worked diligently to reduce the inequity in educational opportunities for economically disadvantaged children here in South Los Angeles. 98% of our students graduate from High School and 95% enroll in college.

Why it's important.

Music is deeply woven into the culture of Holy Name of Jesus School and is a part of every school activity. Our innovative music education program immerses students in both theory and application and is taught by professional musicians. Each student learns to read music and to play a musical instrument. Students K-3 begin by learning to play piano. Students grades 4-8 select drums, woodwinds or brass.

Why we need your help.

We provide all the instruments for our students which are donated are donated to the school by various foundations and individuals. While we teach our students how to care for the instruments they do need to be refurbished periodically because of normal wear and tear. This year we find ourselves with an inordinate number of flutes (30)  and trumpets (21) which need to be serviced and/or repaired. 

The funds received during this campaign will be used to assure our instruments are operational for the coming school year (flutes $1900, trumpets $1600).

The Impact

Holy Name of Jesus School firmly believes that our music program contributes to the academic success and intellectual development of our students.
According to “Effects of Music Training on Brain and Cognitive Development in Under-Privileged 3- to 5-Year-Olds” (Helen Neville, Ph.D., et al University of Oregon/Dana Arts and Cognition Consortium research) low income children exposed to music on a regular basis “display gains in a number of cognitive areas, including language, pre-literacy and visual-spatial skills, numeracy” and “produce significant improvements in cognition and school performance”

Risks & Challenges

Without your help our music program could be seriously impaired. Most of our students would not be able to participate in this program if the school did not provide the instruments. We have enough instruments, they just need to be serviced.
Charles Music in Glendale, CA has agreed to provide us with deeply discounted servicing rates for which we are very grateful.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help us:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Who We Are

Roberto Tiranti, Ken Ingwersen & Tom Fossheim = WONDERWORLD :-)

A classic rock trio from Norway and Italy!

Also known as "Live Fire", the permanent band of Uriah Heep's legendary songwriter; Ken Hensley. 

Check out www.wonderworld.no for more info and our first album!

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support in making album number 2!

We got a lot of help from you all on our first album, and we have 10 new songs we will record and release as WONDERWORLD II in November/December this year.

If we don't achieve our goal, we still promise to release the album and fulfill all the perks you have bought!
Help us by buying "perks" here!
Here are some of our perks:

  • Your name in the "thank you"-list on the CD.
  • A signed CD from all the band members.
  • A signed vinyl LP from all the band members.
  • A digital download of the full album.
  • Signed vinyl versions of the first album. Limited edition!
  • A signed bass from Roberto!
  • A signed guitar from Ken!….and more :-)

story:
Supporting Grosbeak Guitars

As a small business located in Henry's hometown of Yonkers, New York, the expansion project of Grosbeak Guitars will allow Henry to move into a more efficient space, purchase additional equipment, create an e-commerce website, and hire employees.

Henry is dedicated to keep Grosbeak Guitars as a handmade, made in New York business. He is currently working with local lumber suppliers in Westchester County, NY.

Henry cares for the environment and has made a promise to use eco-friendly materials at Grosbeak Guitars, such as water soluble paint.

Henry is passionate about music and community. Grosbeak Guitars will have a philanthropy division that will work with local school districts and encourage music in the classroom.

Henry’s Resume:

Bassist, Last Dying Word 2005-2007

Noteable Performaces: Opening act for New Found Glory at the Webster Theater, Connecticut

Bassist, Lion in The Mane 2009-2014

Noteable Performances: New York City –

Arlene’s Grocery

The Bowery Ballroom

Tours:

Lion in The Mane showcased at CMJ, SXSW, Firefly, Florida Music Festival, LAUNCH, So What Festival, and Taking the Detour.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please, share this link and tell your friends and family about our campaign. You can also follow Grosbeak Guitars on Instagram and Twitter @GrosbeakGuitars and "like" us on Facebook too at Facebook.com/GrosbeakGuitars

story:
A little about myself to start with
My name is Laura and I am an Italian jazz singer and a songwriter.
Six years ago I moved from my hometown Palermo, Sicily, to the Big Apple to take a bite but the Apple was enchanted and it turned me into a New Yorker :)

I have been working on Double Mirror, my debut album, for quite a while and what was supposed to be a simple recording turned into a life experience that taught me the world about myself. Double Mirror is a project I deeply believe in and I want to share it with the world. That’s why I am here telling you this story today.

About Double Mirror
I believe everyone needs a mirror to look into, to recognize themselves, to see their flaws and good qualities as they really are. The double mirror is the search for balance. It is the acknowledgement that my heart is divided between my art and real life, between Europe and America. The double mirror reflects my dual nature, strong and weak, determined and lazy, passionate and afraid, and I hope you’ll take interest in it and decide to look into the mirror yourself, see what you'll find!

Double Mirror is not just an album. Rather, it’s an experience, an invitation into the inner self, a journey that starts softly, like falling asleep, and then goes deeper into different, colorful scenarios, each with its own lights and shadows, like walking along an unexplored new path, a fun path that leads to a newly found self and sense of purpose.

You can take a peek at the 13 songs in the album by visiting the Homepage of my brand new website. A preview player is waiting there for you!

The Making
They say Rome wasn’t built in a day but they never tell how long did it actually take! I guess you never know until you embark on your own creative adventure and face first hand all the bumps in the road…

Well, Double Mirror took a few years in the making and now I know it couldn’t have sounded as amazing if the process would have been any easier. Through hardship we discover our own value, we challenge our life and overcome our fears, freeing our spirit and accomplishing our human revolution. That is what art should always be about!

In the process of doing so, I have found I have supporters and friends all over the globe, I have flown to Buenos Aires, Argentina and recorded at a studio that has its own sweat lodge, sang inside a gong and almost broke in tears to bring out my deepest feelings. This is the process of creating and this is what I want you to be a part of.


At the studio in Buenos Aires, with Feco Escofet and his gong!

The Team
Once I decided to put Double Mirror out on my own, after years of feeling like that might actually never happen, I knew there was only one way that would have made it worthy and I told myself: SHOOT FOR THE MOON, GIRL! I determined to go all out and was able to put together a team of truly wonderful professionals to help me do it.

I got the top notch musicians and engineers, who have put their best art into this musical effort, I got my partner in crime Emilio D. Miler who brought the album to its highest potential, and three promoters who took this CD at heart. I really am surrounded with love and passion!



Meet Ameen, Flavio, Greg, Jonathan, Gianluca, 6V, Zach, Giovanni,
Andrés, El pantera, Emilio, Ari,Pax and Vincent

The Perks
I hope you’ll find something that speaks to you out of the fun list of sexy perks I put together! There’s music and art plus the chance to have a chat, a class or a live show with yours truly ;)

Look at the four beautiful, original paintings by Pax Paloscia you will get, in the form of cute postcards, when purchasing the Pax Box!


The $$$
So, what am I going to do with the money you could help me raise, you might ask? I will be perfectly candid with you and tell it as it is: I have two goals in mind. The first one is to pay back the loan I took to get the music and the team together. The second and most crucial one is to have a minimum base to start scheduling a tour to bring Double Mirror live around the States and, who knows, the world.

Recorded music is great, but it needs to go live to fully accomplish its mission. The stage is where a song grows, touching different people every night and in so many different ways. I do hope you will help me reach these goals!

Please remember that there is no such thing as too little a contribution. Every dollar counts! You can make the difference and I hope you will feel compelled to do so by donating just as much as you want or can, and perhaps inviting you friends to visit this page, learn about Double Mirror and become a part of the family.

Every contribution will get a special, public thank you on my Facebook Artist Page, accompanied by a picture of me shining in pure happiness. Send me your FB name if you’d like to be tagged on it!

GRAZIE MILLE!
Laura

 

PS: Special thanks to my big little brother Simone for creating the beautiful campaign video. Simone is currently working on the official video of Morningside, Double Mirror closing track... Stay tuned! 

 

CD RELEASE PARTY!
Great news! Double Mirror will be officially presented to the NYC crowd on July 2 at DROM. Show goes from 8 to 9pm, doors open at 7pm and you can get tickets here. Come join the celebration!
story_txt: A little about myself to start withMy name is Laura and I am an Italian jazz singer and a songwriter.Six years ago I moved from my hometown Palermo, Sicily, to the Big Apple to take a bite but the Apple was enchanted and it turned me into a New Yorker :)I have been working on Double Mirror, my debut album, for quite a while and what was supposed to be a simple recording turned into a life experience that taught me the world about myself. Double Mirror is a project I deeply believe in and I want to share it with the world. That’s why I am here telling you this story today.About Double MirrorI believe everyone needs a mirror to look into, to recognize themselves, to see their flaws and good qualities as they really are. The double mirror is the search for balance. It is the acknowledgement that my heart is divided between my art and real life, between Europe and America. The double mirror reflects my dual nature, strong and weak, determined and lazy, passionate and afraid, and I hope you’ll take interest in it and decide to look into the mirror yourself, see what you'll find!Double Mirror is not just an album. Rather, it’s an experience, an invitation into the inner self, a journey that starts softly, like falling asleep, and then goes deeper into different, colorful scenarios, each with its own lights and shadows, like walking along an unexplored new path, a fun path that leads to a newly found self and sense of purpose.You can take a peek at the 13 songs in the album by visiting the Homepage of my brand new website. A preview player is waiting there for you!The MakingThey say Rome wasn’t built in a day but they never tell how long did it actually take! I guess you never know until you embark on your own creative adventure and face first hand all the bumps in the road…Well, Double Mirror took a few years in the making and now I know it couldn’t have sounded as amazing if the process would have been any easier. Through hardship we discover our own value, we challenge our life and overcome our fears, freeing our spirit and accomplishing our human revolution. That is what art should always be about!In the process of doing so, I have found I have supporters and friends all over the globe, I have flown to Buenos Aires, Argentina and recorded at a studio that has its own sweat lodge, sang inside a gong and almost broke in tears to bring out my deepest feelings. This is the process of creating and this is what I want you to be a part of.At the studio in Buenos Aires, with Feco Escofet and his gong!The TeamOnce I decided to put Double Mirror out on my own, after years of feeling like that might actually never happen, I knew there was only one way that would have made it worthy and I told myself: SHOOT FOR THE MOON, GIRL! I determined to go all out and was able to put together a team of truly wonderful professionals to help me do it.I got the top notch musicians and engineers, who have put their best art into this musical effort, I got my partner in crime Emilio D. Miler who brought the album to its highest potential, and three promoters who took this CD at heart. I really am surrounded with love and passion!Meet Ameen, Flavio, Greg, Jonathan, Gianluca, 6V, Zach, Giovanni,Andrés, El pantera, Emilio, Ari,Pax and VincentThe PerksI hope you’ll find something that speaks to you out of the fun list of sexy perks I put together! There’s music and art plus the chance to have a chat, a class or a live show with yours truly ;)Look at the four beautiful, original paintings by Pax Paloscia you will get, in the form of cute postcards, when purchasing the Pax Box!The $$$So, what am I going to do with the money you could help me raise, you might ask? I will be perfectly candid with you and tell it as it is: I have two goals in mind. The first one is to pay back the loan I took to get the music and the team together. The second and most crucial one is to have a minimum base to start scheduling a tour to bring Double Mirror live around the States and, who knows, the world.Recorded music is great, but it needs to go live to fully accomplish its mission. The stage is where a song grows, touching different people every night and in so many different ways. I do hope you will help me reach these goals!Please remember that there is no such thing as too little a contribution. Every dollar counts! You can make the difference and I hope you will feel compelled to do so by donating just as much as you want or can, and perhaps inviting you friends to visit this page, learn about Double Mirror and become a part of the family.Every contribution will get a special, public thank you on my Facebook Artist Page, accompanied by a picture of me shining in pure happiness. Send me your FB name if you’d like to be tagged on it!GRAZIE MILLE!Laura PS: Special thanks to my big little brother Simone for creating the beautiful campaign video. Simone is currently working on the official video of Morningside, Double Mirror closing track... Stay tuned!  CD RELEASE PARTY!Great news! Double Mirror will be officially presented to the NYC crowd on July 2 at DROM. Show goes from 8 to 9pm, doors open at 7pm and you can get tickets here. Come join the celebration!

story:
Wet Nose Dogs - Debut Album

 

After a ten plus year music career in Nashville, TN, Philip Calder moved back home to South Carolina thinking he would never sing again. Philip longed to take the stage again but life’s circumstances seemed to prevent his return to stage at every turn. In 2016, Philip met a new friend that refused to let his gift lie dormant. His friend forced Philip to sing with him while he played the guitar and they began to cover songs. In 2017 they sparked attention by releasing videos online. Attention began to mount as these videos gained views and likes, and in August of 2017, Philip set out in a journey that would create the band Wet Nose Dogs. Philip contacted a childhood friend, Evan Lee, who had grown into a prominent electric/acoustic guitarist. They decided to begin rehearsing and playing shows. Wet Nose Dogs is now consistently booked at least two months in advance and their momentum continues to build. Their unique take on the genres of Country, Rock, R&B, Southern Rock, Pop, and Hip Hop has broken outside of the traditional box and embodies perfectly the genre of Eclectic Soul…Southern style of course.

This campaign is simple. We are ready to create music Ready to make Wet Nose Dogs a household name. To bring the genre of Southern Soul to life with a mixture of new and old-some country flare meets soulful, bluesy vocals that will leave your soul longing for more! We need funding for the practical purpose of making the album. Typically independent music production can run roughly $2,000 per track on the low end. From studio time for instrumentation, vocals, and back ground vocals, to the mixing and mastering process, it takes time, and time is money. Then there is also pressing and producing physical CD's and securing online distribution. Please take a look at our links to our music, which right now are cover tune and help us leave our mark on the world. You will be able to get a grasp of our vibe and the potential that our original tracks will  bring to the industry. 

We have producers and musicians in Nashville ready and eager to help us create this sound and record it, all we need is the green light. Your money turns the light green!!

 

What We Need & What You Get

As of now, we are seeking $20,000. What do you get if you contribute? For each investor that contributes, there are perks that you will receive. From a finished product copy of the album, all the way up to executive producer level. Check out the perks section for details!! 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Of course, musicians and bands are a dime a dozen and so many make projects that flop, or bands fold for one reason or another. But we believe in our core there is something here. The soulful whaling of Philip Calder grips your spirit and Evan Lee shreds on acoustic and electric and the two of them together are unmatched in their live concert experience with top of the line equipment and live looping that takes their duo to an entirely fuller sound experience. The challenges we will face comes when we do not have label backing. As independent artists we will have to fight to get the music heard and pay radio promoters to get the tunes to radio and beyond.  But we are ready, and we believe the music will speak for itself. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

What can everyone do? Please share the campaign, let your friends know about the campaign and the band! Please use the Indiegogo share tools and help us spread the word!

story:
A Little About Indie On Air Records

At Indie on Air Records, we are passionate about the independent artist and helping them to reach the next level of their careers. We are a simple partnership based on transperancy and collective help. People realize more today how the music industry has been corrupted and it is really out of reach for most people.It's all about metrics more than talent. That is what the system has become. Other "indie" labels  also have become pay to play like many venues. It is unfortunate, but it is what it is. Indie on Air Records has been launched because we feel it is more needed than ever before. Artists need not only help but that platform of support and guidance. Indie on Air Records is here to be just that for up and coming bands.

What We Need & What You Get

As part of the support we offer growing indie artists, and by making the final product available for pre-sale, we are raising money to fund the production of live recordings from Ambrose, Fret Highway, and The Boleys that will be released on the Indie on Air Records label:

  • We are trying to raise $5000 to record these amazing independent artists and give you cool Texas Indie Fest swag as well!
  • If we go over our goal, we are planning to release a compilation CD with more live artist tracks from Texas Indie Fest!
  • You can purchase any band's recording individually or all three. Look for their name in the perk title!
  • If we don't reach your entire goal, funds will still go towards recording these deserving bands. We want to give them the best possible jumpstart to their careers anyway we can!

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • Help us get the word out about this campaign and share, share, share on social media!
  • Don't forget use can use the Indiegogo share tools to do just that!
  • If you are in the Austin, TX, area, join us at Texas Indie Fest, Red Shed Tavern, March 14th through 17th, 2018, and cheer really loud for these great bands! You could end up on one of the CD's!

Ready?!?! Let there be music!!

story:
The Story Behind I Miss You

There is a vulnerability that comes with expressing yourself through any art form. Opening yourself up to the criticism of others is never easy, but there is also so much to gain. In opening yourself up you also give people the opportunity  to feel understood and to recognize that their experience and thoughts are not theirs alone. By donating money to this music video, my first music video, you would help me achieve my dream of being a window through which people can see themselves. 

I Miss You

I Miss You is the first song that i have played a role in  writing, producing  and engineering. An R&B song with jazz influence, I Miss You is a conversation with yourself, exploring whether the good in a relationship is worth dealing with the bad. Written with a friend, Antonella Ponce, through a process of meshing my own thoughts and feelings together. 

Fundraising 

We are looking to raise $3K to make to convey the story of the song with full brevity and beauty. This money will go to camera equipment, location fees, set design, wardrobe, and more. Any little bit counts. We want to give Dana the debut music video that speaks to her story and her style as an artist. Every donation of $10 or above will receive an exclusive link to stream Dana McCoy's debut single for I Miss You when it drops in Spring. Be the first the hear the song and await McCoy's first EP. 

Ways you can support:

  • McCoy will be performing live at Brooklyn Bazaar on February 17th at the Tigris Records show. You don't want to miss it!
  • Donate! Be part of this incredible moment and share the video on social media and amongst your friends and family one it has been completed. We wouldn't be able to make this without you!
  • Once you've donated, feel free to share this campaign on your social media platforms. Spread the word! 

We can't wait to make this video with Dana and we can't wait to share it with all of you! Be sure to keep up to date on all of Dana McCoy's upcoming shows around the city. Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

Bernard Cissa is an amazingly talented gospel musician from Senegal. I've been working with him for the past 5 years supporting him in administration and organization.

His music is profound and catchy. It makes you smile and dance, and yet reflect on the deeper things of life. In a context with less than 5% Christians it is not easy to produce Gospel Music, but Cissa is dedicated to his cause and hopes to brighten up our days, and those of his countrymen with a new Gospel Album!

The new album will include a bonus tracks: new mixes of several of his best songs in French.

What We Need & What You Get

Most of the album will be recorded in our own studio, which will significantly lower the expenses. We plan to buy some new equipment to improve our recording capacities. Some aspects will be recorded in the famous Youssou N'Dour studios here in Dakar. Of course we do need to pay the studio musicians.

The cover will be designed in Senegal, but printed and pressed in Europe to guarantee international quality.

Our perks are of course MUSIC! 

Be the first to enjoy these new songs, or be a Secret Santa and hep us distribute the album in Senegal!

About 50 % of the budget is designated for recording and the other 50% for post-production.           

 

The Impact

As an already nationally know artist, this new album will inevitably have an enormous audience in Senegal. It will open doors for Gospel Music to be heard by people unfamiliar with the Gospel. It will generate hope and love in the hearts of many!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc. etc.

Pray for us!

Contact us for other ways to support if this campaign does not work for you!

story:
Tideshift is an American shoegaze metal band from Chicago IL, formed in 2017 and we will be recording our debut album with Rick Fritz at Audiotree very soon. Music is at the core of who we all are as people and would love the opportunity to make our debut album exceed every expectation imaginable. This is possible but we need your help!  

The Team

Rick Fritz - Recording Engineer 

We could list all the incredible artists Rick has worked with but it might never end. It's enough to say he has worked with The Beach Boys, Brian Wilson, The Orwells, and Chris Cornell just to name a few. He is the lead engineer at Audiotree Music and is a Jedi in the studio. We are beyond honored and excited to be working with him.

 

Tideshift

Richie Pistol: Rythm Guitar/Vocals

Sam Kim: Lead Guitar

Mario Vega; Bass

Brandon Charles: Drums

 

 

Why We Need Your Help

We will be self-financing as much as we can, but in order to do the record justice and really conceptualize the vision we have for our songs, we will have to reach out beyond our limited personal finances. This is where YOU come in! Your donations will allow us to give this record the attention it deserves and bring the listener the most compelling and engaging experience possible. Recording an album is an expensive process and every cent donated will play a valuable part in seeing this project through to the end. The $4,000 raised through IndieGoGo will be distributed as followed.

Studio Time & Recording Engineer: $1,750

Producer Fee: $1,250

Mixing & Mastering Record: $1,000

Our intention is obviously to reach the campaign's goal of $4,000. However, with IndieGoGo's FLEXIBLE FUNDING, even if the entire goal is not reached, your donations will still be a HUGE help, and the funds will be distributed to whichever of the above categories needs the most support.  

Thank you so much for taking time out of your day to help us make our dreams come true.
